def_en: If you describe a place, organization, or activity as impersonal, you mean that it is not very friendly and makes you feel unimportant because it involves or is used by a large number of people.

def_cn: 客观的;不受个人感情(或偏见)影响的
def_en: If you describe someone's behaviour as impersonal, you mean that they do not show any emotion about the person they are dealing with.

def_cn: 非个人的;不带个人色彩的
def_en: An impersonal room or statistic does not give any information about the character of the person to whom it belongs or relates.
